favourite.article: Amen - we Love You Lord Jesus! Brother Higashi, who is now with the Lord he loves, penned this truly. Lord Jesus, thank You for Your work on the cross, and Your work in us. Thank You that You are the ever-faithful one, without whom we would be totally incapable of love. We are for You, because You claimed us for Your own. May we all know You so deeply, and love You so truly.
I like this song because it touches my heart and refreshes my soul. The lyrics of this song express our love to our God, who first loved us.

This song is wonderful. I like the words and the music. This song was truly written by someone with a lot of enjoyment and love for the Lord. I want to enjoy the Lord and really love Him like this brother. By singing this song it encourages me to love the Lord Jesus a little more.
